The shade perfectly matches my skin (light to medium neutral undertone). Previously I used whitish custard. But even though it's whitish, it doesn't make it look gray and doesn't flash back on camera. Luckily, the custard doesn't look patchy on my hands because my hands are a little whiter than my face. If your skin isn't that white, it's better not to use custard. I'm afraid it will look patchy on my hands and neck, especially for those who don't wear the hijab. But custard does make you look brighter. The coverage is super good for me who doesn't have a lot of texture on my face and if my skin prep is right, it doesn't make it cakey. The sponge has 2 textures. Velvet (fluffy) for light coverage and a dense sponge for full coverage. It suits all of Esqa's complexion products. In the photo, I'm using Granola concealer, Granola powder foundation (applied with a brush), and finally Esqa vanilla setting powder to help blur pores. I have a reddish allergic pimple near a mole but it's not visible at all because it's covered by Esqa concealer. real photo without filter using sunlight in a shady place. awesome. recommended product üëçüèª

For the first time disappointed with the sale of esqa products.. Even though I have been a regular buyer of esqa since the time it was only sold at Sephora.. Honestly disappointed because of trivial things, because I didn't get a bonus eye shadow liquid. But of course customers are still disappointed, especially if they have been regular buyers of almost all of their products, even some items were repurchased. I bought it on 4.4, is it true that when I chatted they said that you have to make sure you buy it during the promo period. It's clear that before and after 4.4 there was still a promo every day, helloww don't be delusional :)

This is the first time that a Lazmall class has experienced such a long delivery and packaging (no holidays), my order has not been processed for 5 days, I have complained but no response, I tried to comment on their live toktok and they said this is not official, after commenting on their live toktok the next day I chatted via Lazada and there was a response but they only asked me to wait and no one told me why the packaging took so long, it was not done.

I bought 2 on purpose because of the free mascara, but when it arrived there was no mascara, and now the picture has been changed... I kind of regret it, it doesn't match the promo, when I checked out the free mascara, but when it arrived there was no mascara, how can I complain, and the picture has been changed, now it's weird

for the packaging it's very safe, the powder foundation arrived safely, the powder is good, unfortunately when applied after using sunscreen, the pores are visible and it doesn't set, when I tried it before using sunscreen, it set pretty well and was flawless, but the next day acne appeared, it's a shame it might not suit my skin, maybe it suits other friends, üôè
